label: [{"start":0,"end":7,"text":"肉鸡苍白综合征","labels":["disease"]},{"start":9,"end":14,"text":"呼肠孤病毒","labels":["disease"]},{"start":16,"end":19,"text":"肉仔鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":30,"end":34,"text":"生长缓慢","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":35,"end":39,"text":"增重减慢","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":40,"end":46,"text":"皮肤颜色苍白","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":44,"end":46,"text":"苍白","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":47,"end":53,"text":"羽毛生长不良","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":49,"end":53,"text":"生长不良","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":60,"end":67,"text":"肉鸡苍白综合征","labels":["disease"]},{"start":70,"end":78,"text":"传染性矮小综合征","labels":["disease"]},{"start":79,"end":89,"text":"传染性发育障碍综合征","labels":["disease"]},{"start":90,"end":97,"text":"吸收障碍综合征","labels":["disease"]},{"start":98,"end":104,"text":"传染性腺胃炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":40,"end":42,"text":"皮肤","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":47,"end":49,"text":"羽毛","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 肉鸡苍白综合征是由呼肠孤病毒引起肉仔鸡的一种传染病，临床上以生长缓慢，增重减慢，皮肤颜色苍白，羽毛生长不良为特征，由此，肉鸡苍白综合征曾称为传染性矮小综合征、传染性发育障碍综合征、吸收障碍综合征、传染性腺胃炎等。

label: [{"start":10,"end":13,"text":"肉仔鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 主要危害3周龄以内的肉仔鸡，造成重大经济损失。

label: [{"start":6,"end":8,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":8,"end":12,"text":"明显瘦小","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":13,"end":19,"text":"精神委靡不振","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":20,"end":25,"text":"采食量下降","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":26,"end":30,"text":"粪便稀薄","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":28,"end":30,"text":"稀薄","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":31,"end":39,"text":"内含不消化的饲料","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":26,"end":28,"text":"粪便","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 其临床表现：病鸡明显瘦小，精神委靡不振，采食量下降，粪便稀薄，内含不消化的饲料。

label: [{"start":0,"end":7,"text":"羽毛和皮肤苍白","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":5,"end":7,"text":"苍白","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":26,"end":34,"text":"趾和喙也变成白色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":32,"end":34,"text":"白色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":39,"end":44,"text":"苍白综合征","labels":["disease"]},{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"羽毛","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":3,"end":5,"text":"皮肤","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":9,"end":11,"text":"腿部","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":12,"end":17,"text":"颈部的皮肤","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":18,"end":20,"text":"羽毛","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":28,"end":29,"text":"喙","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":26,"end":27,"text":"趾","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 羽毛和皮肤苍白，而腿部和颈部的皮肤、羽毛表现最明显，趾和喙也变成白色，所以称为苍白综合征。

label: [{"start":3,"end":9,"text":"羽毛生长不良","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":5,"end":9,"text":"生长不良","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":10,"end":16,"text":"遍身留有绒毛","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":17,"end":27,"text":"主翼羽生长迟缓不规则","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":20,"end":27,"text":"生长迟缓不规则","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":28,"end":31,"text":"无光泽","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":32,"end":34,"text":"易断","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":35,"end":39,"text":"身体虚弱","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":40,"end":44,"text":"腿脚无力","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":42,"end":44,"text":"无力","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":45,"end":49,"text":"行动困难","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":52,"end":56,"text":"衰竭死亡","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":3,"end":5,"text":"羽毛","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":17,"end":20,"text":"主翼羽","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":40,"end":42,"text":"腿脚","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":58,"end":61,"text":"健康鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 此外，羽毛生长不良，遍身留有绒毛，主翼羽生长迟缓不规则，无光泽，易断；身体虚弱，腿脚无力，行动困难，最后衰竭死亡或被健康鸡踩死。

label: [{"start":4,"end":8,"text":"腺胃肿胀","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":6,"end":8,"text":"肿胀","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":9,"end":14,"text":"腺胃壁增厚","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":12,"end":14,"text":"增厚","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":15,"end":21,"text":"腺胃黏膜出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":19,"end":21,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":22,"end":24,"text":"溃疡","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":25,"end":31,"text":"腺胃乳头肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":29,"end":31,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":32,"end":36,"text":"模糊不清","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":37,"end":45,"text":"几乎失去分泌作用","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":4,"end":6,"text":"腺胃","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":9,"end":12,"text":"腺胃壁","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":15,"end":19,"text":"腺胃黏膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":25,"end":29,"text":"腺胃乳头","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 剖检可见腺胃肿胀，腺胃壁增厚，腺胃黏膜出血、溃疡，腺胃乳头肿大，模糊不清，几乎失去分泌作用。

label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"肌胃体积缩小","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":2,"end":6,"text":"体积缩小","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":7,"end":11,"text":"肌肉松弛","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":9,"end":11,"text":"松弛","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":12,"end":16,"text":"收缩无力","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":17,"end":26,"text":"角质膜粗糙不易剥离","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":20,"end":26,"text":"粗糙不易剥离","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"肌胃","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":7,"end":9,"text":"肌肉","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":17,"end":20,"text":"角质膜","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 肌胃体积缩小，肌肉松弛，收缩无力，角质膜粗糙不易剥离。

label: [{"start":0,"end":7,"text":"肠浆膜有出血点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":4,"end":7,"text":"出血点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":8,"end":11,"text":"出血斑","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":12,"end":16,"text":"肠道膨胀","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":14,"end":16,"text":"膨胀","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":17,"end":21,"text":"肠腔扩大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":19,"end":21,"text":"扩大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":26,"end":39,"text":"含有未消化饲料的水样内容物","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":43,"end":50,"text":"橘红色黏液样物","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":51,"end":60,"text":"有未消化的饲料碎片","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":43,"end":46,"text":"橘红色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"肠浆膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":12,"end":14,"text":"肠道","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":17,"end":19,"text":"肠腔","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 肠浆膜有出血点或出血斑，肠道膨胀，肠腔扩大，前段充满含有未消化饲料的水样内容物，后段有橘红色黏液样物并有未消化的饲料碎片。

label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"骨质钙化不全","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":7,"end":9,"text":"易断","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":10,"end":12,"text":"变形","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":13,"end":18,"text":"肋骨头肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":16,"end":18,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":19,"end":22,"text":"念珠状","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":13,"end":16,"text":"肋骨头","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 骨质钙化不全，易断，变形，肋骨头肿大呈念珠状。

label: [{"start":0,"end":7,"text":"肉鸡苍白综合征","labels":["type"]},{"start":11,"end":16,"text":"特效治疗药","labels":["drug"]},{"start":17,"end":19,"text":"疫苗","labels":["drug"]},{"start":32,"end":38,"text":"执行消毒制度","labels":["control"]},{"start":39,"end":47,"text":"保证日粮营养全价","labels":["control"]},{"start":80,"end":86,"text":"及时淘汰病鸡","labels":["control"]},{"start":87,"end":92,"text":"无害化处理","labels":["control"]},{"start":58,"end":62,"text":"法式囊病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":68,"end":75,"text":"免疫抑制性疾病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":84,"end":86,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 肉鸡苍白综合征目前尚无特效治疗药和疫苗，必须采取综合性防制措施，执行消毒制度，保证日粮营养全价，杜绝病原的传人，做好法式囊病的免疫，防制免疫抑制性疾病的发生等，及时淘汰病鸡，无害化处理。
